Title: Provides for review of bail data reports by the state commission on judicial conduct
Summary: Provides for review of bail data reports by the state commission on judicial conduct to study such reports for evidence of bias or prejudice by any judge or justice, and where appropriate based on such reports, to initiate, investigate, and hear complaints and otherwise comment on matters of bias and prejudice evidenced therein.
LawCode: Amd §§42 & 216, Judy L; amd §837-u, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law and the executive law, in relation to providing for review of bail data reports by the state commission on judicial conduct
